name: vanilla-store
description: A JavaScript lib to store stuff

scripts.coveralls: rm -rf ./coverage && npm run istanbul && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: npm run jasmine && npm run coveralls
